short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Canvaid enhances your Canvas experience by providing additional features such as test-redoing and answer collation!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Canvaid is the extension you need to enhance your learning further.

Collate quizzes in one click and view them on the main site (https://canvaid.com).
There, you can re-do quizzes, check for the correct answer, flag important questions, and leave comments that help you remember key details.

This extension provides a one-click way to upload quizzes, instead of having to save and upload the HTML file manually.
